DOC.criteria: Men woman , age 18 55 year Body mass index range 18 30 kg/m2 Healthy determine investigator basis medical history , physical examination , clinical laboratory test result , vital sign , 12lead ECG History cardiac , thyroid , muscle , kidney abnormality A family history long QT syndrome and/or sudden cardiac death History clinically significant drug allergy , hypersensitivity sulfonomides quinolone class antibiotic
